RST.value: 1. Press RST button over 10 seconds, onu can restore factory defaults and reboot. 2. Press RST button quickly, onu reboot.

Packing List.value: Contents         Quantity                 Contents           Quantity HG323RGW   1 pcs                     Power adapter     1 pcs User Manual   1 pcs

Installation Environment Requirements.value: ONU equipment must be installed in the interior, and to ensure the following conditions: • Confirmation at the ONU installation at sufficient space to facilitate cooling machine. • ONU suitable operating temperature of -5°C-55°C humidity 10% to 90%. • Device workplace should avoid radio transmitters, radar stations, and high-frequency interference from power equipment.

Desktop Installation.value: 1. installed on the desktop Place the machine on a clean bench, this installation is relatively simple, you can observe the following operation: • Ensure the smooth workbench. • Give enough space around the device for heat dissipation. • Do not place any object on the device

Wall Mount Installation.value: 2. mounted on the wall • Observation ONU equipment chassis two cruciform recess, in accordance with the position of the groove, installed two screws in the wall. • The original selected two mounting screws gently snap into recesses aligned. • Slowly let go, so that the device under the support of the screw hanging on the wall.

Cabling and Power.value: 3. Connect fiber, network cable and power adapter to the corresponding interfaces, and turn on the power.

executive_summary.main_purpose: The primary purpose of this document is to provide step-by-step instructions for the quick installation of the HG323RGW device, including safety, environment, and setup guidelines.
action_items: Restore factory defaults or reboot using RST button if needed
Connect device to power using the specified adapter
Verify packing list contents before installation
Install device indoors, following environment and mounting requirements
Connect fiber, network cable, and power adapter to appropriate ports

detailed_analysis.comprehensive_overview:
This installation guide is designed to facilitate the rapid and correct setup of the HG323RGW device. It begins with details on operating key interfaces and buttons, explains what is included in the packaging, and emphasizes the need for device certification. The document describes installation prerequisites, both environmental and spatial, ensuring that the equipment is installed safely and functionally.

The body of the guide is structured to walk users through unpacking, verifying contents, and installation, including both desktop and wall-mounting scenarios. It includes specific advice on avoiding interference from external devices, maintaining temperature and humidity, and the need for adequate ventilation for proper heat dissipation. Safety considerations and instructions for device handling are incorporated throughout the guide.

Business-wise, the document supports a reduction in support queries by providing clear visual and textual instructions, minimizing errors during field installation. It demonstrates regulatory due diligence through inclusion of mandatory certification, aligning with quality assurance standards.

Its significance lies in enabling efficient installation, regulatory compliance, and end-user satisfaction with limited need for technical intervention. The detailed focus on both environmental and operational requirements helps mitigate post-sale issues and returns, enhancing product reliability and customer trust.
